description: On this sweater, our iconic Polo Bear wears distressed denim, a Fair Isle sweater, and a sport coat with a rakishly upturned collar. At his wrist is an embroidered version of our Denim Flag Bear Watch.
fitting_details: Regular Fit: wider at the chest while still maintaining a modern silhouette.
Size medium has a 27" body length (front and back), a 17¼" shoulder, a 43" chest, and a 25¼" sleeve length. Sleeve length changes ½" between sizes.
Polo Bear intarsia-knit at the center front. Embroidered details.
Rib-knit hem. "RL" embroidered at the left hem.
Shell: cotton. Decoration: 87% cotton, 8% linen, 2% wool, 2% other fibers, 1% camel hair (exclusive of decoration).
Model is 6'1"/185 cm and wears a size medium.
